author: Chris McLemore
comment: Looks great on my Moto 360. Rated 4 stars, but with a couple improvements, could be a 5 star rating. First, the dial markers (minute ticks around face) could be a little bolder. Most colors wash into the background. Second, an adjustable screen on time. A couple other watch faces have recently added this, and it is a very nice addition.
title: Looks great!

author: Garrett Crowe
comment: I see some people complaining about the battery drain. I feel it's because of the inability to disable to animations. While I think the pulse and second animations look cool, they are a massive strain on the battery. The ability to disable those, not just make them transparent, would be manor boost for the watchface. Being able to resize the text would be helpful as well.
title: Looks cool. Needs a bit more customization.

author: Erin Hedlund
comment: The option to keep color ambient mode does not work.  Could also use an option for how long to keep in Active mode before switching to ambient.  Would totally 5-star this face if we had these!   (LG Urbane, Samsung Galaxy 6, Marshmallow)
title: Ambient Bug

author: Brian Lininger
comment: I don't pay for watch faces and this is the best free one I have come across. You can change all of the colors which a lot of free versions won't allow. And I love that you get an indicator on the face showing you how many new texts you have.
title: Great app

author: Yuben Chen
comment: Great looking watch face! A little bit draining on the battery life, but still manageable.   One key thing that is bugging me though is, what is the correct format to change the "Date format text"? I've tried mm/dd/yyyy, to manually inputting the date, nothing seems to work properly. Please tell me!!

looks great on a zenwatch 2,  i see some complain about certain omitted widgets but I think it may spoil it. With regard to the animation being unable to disable,  the remedy for this is in the watch functions and settings,  timeouts etc. this is a polished high quality face,  looked great square or round
title: my favourite face

author: John Miller
comment: Text size is not adjustable and certainly not like the screen shots, fills up maybe a 1/3 of my screen on my huawei.  Seems this is another abandoned watch apps to add to the long list.

author: Bogdan Lixandru
comment: I installed over then 20-30 watch faces, and i uninstalled becose not working good. This one working perfect. Thx for developers. Huawei watch and Samsung s 4.
title: Very very good product!!!

author: Oki Handriawan
comment: The only problem i have is how to make the date to dd/mm/yy? Already tried that but the "mm" parts show the minutes instead.. not the month.

reply.author: PacketbirD
reply.content: Please try to set dd/MM/yy (MM must be uppercase) .  Thank you.

title: Nice watchface

author: Brett Burmeister
comment: The watch face looks polished with active and ambient screen, and the flash during every move of the second hand looks really cool on the moto 360.  It would be nice if it had customizations, but otherwise it is a great looking face.
title: Cool effect

author: Josh Patton
comment: Hands down my favorite watch face.  Any chance you could make a non military time version. Alot of people prefer it. Love the updated options,  bought you a beer, keep up the good work.

author: Steven P
comment: I like this watch face a lot. What would make this even better, is if there was a setting where you could control the display time (how long the screen stays on for) and be able to save different color combinations. Also, being able to turn off animations to save battery life, would be a plus.
title: Nice watch face, but could use some more customization

author: Randall Bowman
comment: This watch face does exactly what I want a watch to do and nothing more. It simply looks cool doing it. I don't need weather, steps, or phone battery every time I look at my Zenwatch. There is a reason for Now cards. What's important here is, with the appearance of this face and how it functions it is able to provide very good battery life. After 10 hours I'm usually around 60%. Sure this can vary by usage. I just know I'll be using this one a while.
title: The Best

author: Richard Cliffe
comment: If this had a weather widget the same as the 'LED With Weather' watchface (add forecast and custom options etc) then this would be the best on the market, bar none! I bought you a beer anyway, as it's still a great watchface 😃
title: ALMOST perfect!

author: Ray Gallagher
comment: Would not mind a few ads, but now popping up all the time on home page and other apps. So changed mind and must delete!! So many ads popping up right now that I can hardly write this review! Grrrr!! Horrible... Don't use it!!!!
title: Changed my mind... Ads.. Ads...

author: Wayne Henning
comment: It used to be amazing but apparently a recent update has now seen the add-on not loading into android wear. Doesn't even show as a watch face option on phone. Can only pick on watch with defaults, no more customization ability.

author: Trevor Gardiner
comment: This is the watch face!  Loaded with customization that can fully change this device. Free customization from the get go but seriously buy the developer a beer!  They deserve it. Battery does not drain rapidly.
title: Top tier level watch face

author: Nisan Danışman
comment: I really enjoy this face but the excessive battery usage makes it impossible to be used everyday. Couple of updates later, it's sadly still there.
title: Battery hog

author: Peter Shea
comment: Installed, but watch face does not appear in Wear gallery, and no app, either! (LG Urbane + Samsung Note7)
title: Doesn't work!

author: Philip Greene
comment: But when I do, it's this one. I've tried roughly 100 watch faces. From stock installed from Motorola and Huawei, dozens on Watch Maker and Facer, to Puji Black and Krona Sunlight. None of them compare to this one. I love the font they use. The placement of the date and time perfectly meshes together with NEW notifications and doesn't get in the way. Ambient mode is very easy to read and minimal for better battery life. Animation is pleasant to look at when the watch face turns on. Watch face is perfect. 5/5
title: I don't often review watch faces and give a five star rating.

author: Subramanian Gopalakrishnan
comment: Just installed as I need date with time. Nice to see battery status too. Would like to wait and watch battery usage and then give five stars.
title: Like it

author: Robert Hall
comment: I have an lg urbane 2nd edition watch & this  watch face stays on draining the watches battery. It's a nice watch face but no total fail.

author: A. AMAYA
comment: Everything I want im a modern digital face. The edge flashing seconds is a nice touch.
title: One of my Favorites

author: ALFRED83COMIX ___
comment: Great everything is fixed and works even better so sick
title: Sick update nice job

author: Justin Rycaj
comment: Add a step counter to a premium version. Reverse the battery bar to fill towards an individual's step count goal instead of emptying in its standard use.
title: Perfect except for one feature

author: Dave Stokes
comment: As of this writing, it does not work on Zenwatch2. All it says is that it's for Android Wear.
title: Won't work

author: Peter Goldsmith
comment: Brillant looking watch face , installed and works no problem on my Huawei watch ... Well worth buying the man a beer

author: clif bartram
comment: This is an amazing app! LG G watch here and it looks and feels like the best watch app so far. Everything is customizable which I think is a total credit to the creator.
title: Amazing

author: Chee Saw
comment: This is my go to watch face. Looks extremely high tech and is very functional.  Great watch face to have selected when showing off your smart watch to others!
title: Number one

author: Scott Abramczyk
comment: This is one of the best watch faces out there today. I'm gonna have to buy this dev a beer. Good job,
title: Lots of great options

author: Ronnie Wheeler
comment: Put a weather option on it dude and it will perfect.....just sayin
title: No Weather?

author: Sylvester T. Echols
comment: My go to watch face. Futuristic. Not too much and cool to look at.
title: My favorite

author: Brett Inman
comment: bought the premium version to change colors. wish it had the phone battery line on the bottom of the circle. enjoy your beer, sir.
title: love this watch face

author: Joo Hoo
comment: It not working at my watch..  Previously it's working fine, but now it won't work anymore please help and solve this problem.. Thanks

author: Steve Hope
comment: Just updated and color options are not changing on the watch. No matter which part I change it keeps the defaults. Using G watch r.

author: Thomas Grimes
comment: I would give this app five stars if the battery wasn't so bad with this watch face but overall a great face.

author: Xiao Lin
comment: Edit parts only let's you edit the colors? Even though it says it's supposed to let you sort, add and delete..

reply.author: PacketbirD
reply.content: OMFG I've told a lie. It can only do change color. I'm sorry!

author: Tj Smith
comment: The customization does not seem to work with my lg g watch r. But one of my favorite faces

author: Diomy Yunsa
comment: It's free, customizable, and not shady. It was the first watch face I downloaded and I still mainly use it.
title: It's really cool

author: Arkan Hadi
comment: I like it, if only the alignment of the digital time is centered it would be perfect, consider making an alignment option for the digital component
title: Neat
